item.description: Matthew O’Keefe Assistant Professor of Economics, Vanderbilt University Microeconomist interested in energy, power markets, and the environment. Email: matthew.okeefe@vanderbilt.edu Contact Download CV Bio   Publications Unilateral Market Power in Financial Transmission Rights Auctions The Energy Journal, 46 (3), 103-122 (2025). Working Papers Make, Buy, or Share: Understanding Produced Water Reuse in the Marcellus Shale Price Adjustment and Competition in US Strategic Petroleum Reserve Drawdowns Revise and Resubmit, American Economic Journal: Economic Policy
